content: the pattern includes instructions for 4 different dishcloths dishcloth is knit in two colors - one at a time a total of 100 yards is needed which is 50 yards each of two opposing colors **note** sep 21 2023 an error in the pattern was discovered and a new version has been uploaded ** note 2 ** oct 4 2023 another error on dishcloth #3 was corrected
